traits.locale_text: Вы хранили одну из книг суда и с помощью неё изъяли небывалую по ценности десятину с мятежного имперского мира

languages.text: Вы хранили одну из копий регионального Лекса и с помощью указанных в ней дополнений изъяли небывалую по ценности десятину с мятежного имперского мира.
You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.
languages.original_text: Вы хранили одну из копий регионального Лекса и с помощью указанных в ней дополнений изъяли небывалую по ценности десятину с мятежного имперского мира.

traits.locale_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to demand a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.
You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to demand a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.
You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.
You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.
You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.
You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

languages.text: Du hast eine Kopie des regionalen Lex aufbewahrt und die darin enthaltenen Zusätze genutzt, um auf einer rebellierenden imperialen Welt einen Zehnt in beispielloser Höhe zu erheben.
languages.original_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

traits.locale_text: Du hast eine Kopie des regionalen Lex aufbewahrt und die darin enthaltenen Zusätze genutzt, um auf einer rebellierenden imperialen Welt einen Zehnt in beispielloser Höhe zu erheben.

languages.text: Vous avez préservé un exemplaire de la Lex régionale et utilisé ses annexes pour obliger un monde impérial rebelle à s'acquitter d'un paiement de la dîme sans précédent.
languages.original_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez préservé un exemplaire de la Lex régionale et utilisé ses annexes pour obliger un monde impérial rebelle à s'acquitter d'un paiement de la dîme sans précédent.

languages.text: 你小心翼翼地保存着某个地区法典的副本，遵循其中附录部分的条款，从某个造反的帝国世界中征收到了海量什一税，数额之大前所未有。
languages.original_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

traits.locale_text: 你小心翼翼地保存着某个地区法典的副本，遵循其中附录部分的条款，从某个造反的帝国世界中征收到了海量什一税，数额之大前所未有。

languages.text: Conservaste una copia de la Lex regional y usaste sus apéndices para extraer un diezmo con un valor sin precedentes de un mundo Imperial rebelde.
languages.original_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

traits.locale_text: Conservaste una copia de la Lex regional y usaste sus apéndices para extraer un diezmo con un valor sin precedentes de un mundo Imperial rebelde.

languages.text: その地域のレックスの写しを保存し、その補足条項を活用して、反乱を起こした帝国の惑星から前代未聞の価値のある租税を取り立てた。
languages.original_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

traits.locale_text: その地域のレックスの写しを保存し、その補足条項を活用して、反乱を起こした帝国の惑星から前代未聞の価値のある租税を取り立てた。

languages.text: Bölgesel Lex kopyalarından birini muhafaza ettin ve içerdiği eklerin yardımıyla isyankâr bir İmparatorluk Dünyası'ndan eşi benzeri görülmemiş büyüklükte bir aşar kopardın.
languages.original_text: You preserved a copy of the regional Lex and used the appendices therein to extract a tithe of unprecedented value from a rebelling Imperial world.

traits.locale_text: Bölgesel Lex kopyalarından birini muhafaza ettin ve içerdiği eklerin yardımıyla isyankâr bir İmparatorluk Dünyası'ndan eşi benzeri görülmemiş büyüklükte bir aşar kopardın.
